channel.title: testing on Geowarin
channel.description: Recent content in testing on Geowarin

item.title: What is a good unit test?
item.description: What constitutes good unit test might be a little more involved that you think. Let’s reflect on the practice to make sure that we test our applications as efficiently as possible.

item.title: Test your Java application with Groovy
item.description: You can write better tests for your Java application with Spock, Groovy and very little configuration
